Text: Me̩ ki nyʼuma e̩do̩, me̩ ki nyʼabo-mi e̩do̩,
Me̩ nakʼo̩la unye̩do̩ ñw abo Je̩rusale̩m,
Omuko̩la e̩ne̩ ki akwa ef aje̩tachi kakini:
O̩go̩ o̩go̩ du ahi tʼate̩,
Tak ojima Jihofa atejugede,
Omuko̩laʼka kakini, Kwa!
Egbe-wñ akwacha, ododo-wñ acha,
Egbe akwacha, ododo acha;
Uwe̩, Zayo̩n, uwe̩ kʼe̩ nʼakoya uche̩nyo̩ wa,
Go, Ondu Jihofa anʼugbiti wa,
I akʼujo̩ ame̩wño̩re̩-wñ nyʼokije̩ dab adidala,
E̩ne̩ ne̩ e̩do̩wo̩-wñ ñwa omiofo du?
E̩ne̩ fʼAfu Jihofa kpe̩ru e̩ñwa e̩ñwa,
E̩ne̩ i bʼo̩ lʼo̩la todu kʼeju-wñ ki ne̩?
Go, abuche̩ichi uche̩ichi dab e̩kito̩ omiʼka ki kito̩ kwef otube̩,
Le̩bano̩n bebʼiji-wñ jo̩ n,
Abuche̩ichi du chʼo̩wai eju-wñ,
Mak e̩ne̩ uwe̩ adʼO̩jo̩ wawe-wñ taa?
Ode! E̩nuko̩lo̩ ada,
E̩ne̩ kʼale mʼu kʼi ma ne̩ e̩wñ kʼi ako ne n
Ame̩ ma n? Ame̩ te̩te̩gbo̩ n?
E̩ne̩ kʼi gugu atate̩ ñw e̩wñ ki bʼile̩ ma okokolo ate̩-i,
kʼi akʼame̩nojima chʼe̩wñ o̩wai,
Ma ko gbe̩ kpo̩kpe̩ n, ma la ko fia kpo̩kpe̩ n,
Mak e̩ne̩ me̩ adʼumi wawe-wñ
Mʼeju-me̩ korʼate̩, ago:
O Jeko̩b, e̩wñ chi kʼe̩ ka,
Uwe̩ ma n? Uwe̩ te̩te̩gbo̩ n?
I adʼukpahiu ñw abokʼo̩gawu achʼo,
I chaka chʼabimo̩to̩, ochuchu ache ma, uhia la ahia ma,
iñmi abo ku ma nede Jihofa muda aruko,
